title: T213 Red Cobb PSA 2 (only 18 2 or better)
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: T213 Red Cobb PSA 2 (only 18 2 or better)
posts.post_content: Incredible registration and eye appeal on this super tough card.  There are only 18 examples graded 2 or better by PSA.  Price is $12K net to me and includes insured delivery to you.  I collect sales tax from New York Delivery addresses.  "I'll take it" trumps any ongoing negotiations.

[quote name="ullmandds" post=2173277]nice card[/QUOTE]

+1 Very nice card
